description: This file defines a utility function for creating a WebSocket client using the ReconnectingWebSocket library. It constructs a WebSocket URL based on environment variables and optional tokens, providing real-time communication capabilities within a frontend application.

methods.name: createWSClient({ endpoint = "/realtime", token } = {})
methods.description: Creates and configures a ReconnectingWebSocket instance for real-time updates, optionally including an authorization token and custom endpoint.
